full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'PHAGS PA 'JAM DPAL GYI MTSAN YANG DAG PAR BRJOD PA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @018B (BCOM LDAN 'DAS 'JAM DPAL YE SHES SEMS DPA'I DON DAM PA'I MTSAN YANG DAG PAR BRJOD PA, BCOM LDAN 'DAS DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA SH'AKYA THUB PAS GSUNGS PA RDZOGS SO,, ,,RGYA GAR GYI MKHAN PO SHRADDHA KA RA WARMA DANG, KA MA LA GUPTA DANG, ZHU CHEN GYI LO TZTSA BA RIN CHEN BZANG POS BSGYUR CING ZHUS TE GTAN LA PHAB PA'O,, ,,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE PHYOGS DUS KUN TU DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS @019A *, ,PAR GYUR CIG , ,,'DI BRIS DGE BAS BDAG GZHAN 'GRO BA KUN, ,SGRIB SBYANG TSOGS RDZOGS KUN MKHYEN MYUR THOB SHOG , ,,AOm YE DHARM'A HE TU PRA BH'A PA HE TU NTE sh'ANTA THA GA TO HYA BA DAT, TE sh'ANYTZA YO NI RO DHA AE WAm B'A D'I MAH'A SHRAM nA; YE SHV'AH'A,, ,,BKRA SHIS PA DANG DGE LEGS 'PHEL GYUR CIG , ,,)
translator_(орчуулагч): SHRADDHA KA RA WARMA, KA MA LA GUBTA, RIN CHEN BZANG PO,
